entry.title: 3M LDS-FO344-50 - Linear Delineation System Lds-Fo344 Fluorescent Orange 34 in x 4 in 50 Per Carton 7000129360
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Barricades & Delineators
Price: 660.67

[shortdesc]

3M Diamond Grade Linear Delineation Panels, LDS-FO344, fluorescent orange, 34 in x 4 in

  • 3M™ Linear Delineation Panels are designed to provide clear visual guidance for drivers navigating through work zones and challenging roadway conditions
  • Fabricated from 3M™ Diamond Grade™ Reflective Sheeting and laminated onto a thin gauge of aluminum, these corrugated panels provide highly visible retroreflection across a wide range of entrance and observation angles
  • Panels are available in bright and fluorescent colours to provide increased visibility both in daytime and at nighttime
  • Use 3M™ Linear Delineation panels to call attention to altered or changing roadway and can be mounted on surfaces like utility boxes, concrete barriers and metal guardrails
  • Panels include 3M™ VHB™ Tape adhesive strips for application on the back of each panel for easy installation.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Barricades & Delineators

    Product Information

  • Made with bright, durable 3M™ Diamond Grade™ Reflective Sheeting laminated onto a thin gauge of aluminum
  • Bright, fluorescent colours and 3M™ Diamond Grade™ Full Cube Retroreflectors appear highly visible both in daytime and at nighttime
  • Corrugated design increases visibility across a wide range of entrance and observation angles
  • Provides clear visual guidance for drivers navigating through work zones and challenging roadway conditions
  • Apply 3M™ VHB™ Tape on back side for easy installation
  • Colour: Fluorescent orange

    • Suggested Application

  • Reflectorizing concrete barriers and metal guardrails
  • Marking changing roadway conditions
    		•

Vendor: Pioneer
Type: Barricades & Delineators
Price: 18.06

[shortdesc]

Loop Top 44" (112 cm) Delineator Post

  • High-visibility reflective post
  • Two 4-inch high-intensity Type 3 reflective bands at the top of the post
  • Compact storage
  • UV inhibitors resist fading
  • Easy-carry hand hold on pole bottom
  • Top can be used to tie barricade tape or to support standard barricade lights
